hero.title: IEEE ESTU Student Branch
hero.subtitle: Eskişehir Technical University
hero.description: A student community that supports the development of students in technology and engineering, organizing innovative projects and events.

eventsCallout.title: Explore Our Events
eventsCallout.description: We organize a variety of events from workshops to competitions, seminars to project days. Don't miss out on opportunities to contribute to your development!

about.title: About Us
intro: IEEE ESTU Student Branch is an innovative and dynamic student community operating in the field of technology and engineering at Eskişehir Technical University.
As part of IEEE, the world's largest technical professional organization, we offer our members opportunities for technical and personal development.
We add value to our members' careers through workshops, seminars, competitions, and social events.
about.callout: IEEE ESTU Student Branch serves with the following management team for the 2024-2025 academic year:
about.missionText: Support our members' technical and personal growth while contributing to a technology-driven community.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We organize projects and events that push the boundaries of technology.

community.title: Community
community.description: We bring our members together with the industry by building a strong network.

goalOriented.title: Goal Oriented
goalOriented.description: We help acquire the necessary skills to achieve career goals.

growth.title: Growth
growth.description: We provide continuous development in technical and social skills.

missionPoints: Providing technical and professional development opportunities to our members
Developing students' leadership and teamwork skills
Creating awareness in technology and engineering
Taking an active role in national and international projects

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Meet the IEEE ESTU Student Branch team
team.joinDescription: Fill out the registration form to join the IEEE ESTU family and take an active role in our events.

committees.title: Committees and Coordination
committees.subtitle: Technical committees and coordination units under IEEE ESTU Student Branch

aess.name: AESS - Aerospace and Electronic Systems
aess.description: Tracks technological developments in aerospace, space, and defense systems and develops projects.

comsoc.name: ComSoc - Communications Society
comsoc.description: Works on communication systems and network technologies, specializing in 5G and beyond technologies.

cs.name: CS - Computer Society
cs.description: Conducts projects in artificial intelligence, machine learning, and software development.

pes.name: PES - Power and Energy Society
pes.description: Works on renewable energy, smart grids, and energy efficiency.

wie.name: WIE - Women in Engineering
wie.description: Encourages and supports women to take an active role in engineering and technology fields.

kok.name: Student Branch Affinity Coordinatorship
kok.description: Coordinates with IEEE student branches across Turkey, organizes joint events, and strengthens inter-branch collaboration.

pr.name: Public Relations Coordinatorship
pr.description: Conducts the club's social media and promotional activities, produces visual content.

events.title: Our Events
events.subtitle: As IEEE ESTU Student Branch, we contribute to the development of our members through workshops, seminars, competitions, and social events.

upcoming1.title: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Workshop
upcoming1.description: Hands-on introduction to machine learning with Python and TensorFlow.

upcoming2.title: IEEE Xtreme 18.0 Programming Competition
upcoming2.description: We solve algorithmic challenges as a team in the 24-hour global marathon.

past1.title: Cybersecurity Seminar
past1.description: Industry experts shared security trends and career insights.

past2.title: ROV Project Day
past2.description: We showcased prototypes developed by our teams during project day.

newsletter.title: Stay Informed
newsletter.description: Join our newsletter for new events, trainings, and announcements.

sponsors.title: Our Sponsors
sponsors.subtitle: Valuable business partners supporting IEEE ESTU Student Branch.

sponsors.partnershipDescription: Reach a wide audience with our 500+ active members and 50+ annual events. Partner with IEEE ESTU to sponsor leading projects in technology and engineering.

subteams.title: Our Teams
subteams.subtitle: Project teams operating under IEEE ESTU Student Branch

rovstech.name: ROVSTECH - ROV TEAM
rovstech.description: Resuming activities this year, Rovstech is a dynamic team developing underwater technologies. We are preparing for Teknofest, with the future goal of representing our country internationally at the MATE ROV Competition.
features: R&D Studies on Unmanned Underwater Systems
Original Mechanical Design and Sealing Technology
Embedded Systems and Autonomous Navigation Algorithms
Image Processing and Object Detection Solutions
Preparation for Teknofest Unmanned Underwater Systems
achievements: A strong and dynamic team restructured under IEEE ESTU
Goal of becoming a finalist in the Teknofest Unmanned Underwater Systems Competition
Vision of international representation at the MATE ROV Competition
Interdisciplinary R&D culture in mechanical, software, and electronics fields

earendil.name: Earendil - Mars Rover Team
earendil.description: We push the boundaries of technology with our project team, designing Mars rovers, developing AI-supported autonomous systems, and working on space technologies.

cta.title: Join Our Teams
cta.description: Do you want to develop yourself in robotics, software, mechanics, or electronics? Our teams are always looking for new talents!
